item.title: Repotting Old DH Projects
item.description: p{ font-size: 1.5em; margin-bottom: 2em; } @keyframes float { 0% { transform: translatey(0px); } 50% { transform: translatey(-20px); } 100% { transform: translatey(0px); } } Repotting Old Digital Humanities Projects Two Test Cases Jan 31 2020 Knowing how to stop doing things is an important skill to learn. Kind of like learning to say no to things when you donâ€™t have the capacity to do them.
